law.catch_line: Commission to establish internal organization of its offices.
law.text: The commission shall establish the internal organization of its offices and shall divide the commission into such offices or divisions as the commission may deem necessary to perform the functions, powers and duties of the commission, subject to the provisions of KRS Chapter 12.
law.history: Amended 1986 Ky. Acts ch. 245, sec. 1, effective July 15, 1986. -- Amended 1982 Ky. Acts ch. 52, sec. 3, effective July 15, 1982; ch. 82, sec. 15, effective July 15, 1982; and ch. 448, sec. 71, effective July 15, 1982. -- Amended 1978 Ky. Acts ch. 379, sec. 17, effective April 1, 1979. -- Created 1976 Ky. Acts ch. 88, sec. 9, effective March 29, 1976.
